messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning    What would you do?
messages.msgSnippet: ... What??? You UNSCHOOL??   gasp. Maybe the difference is UU s and Unschoolers and Trekies aren t advocating (as far as I know, don t correct me if I m wrong
messages.messageBody:
> Are people supporting or validating Unitarian Universalist beliefs
> by being
> friendly with me? Unschooling? Star Trek?

What??? You UNSCHOOL?? gasp.

Maybe the difference is UU's and Unschoolers and Trekies aren't
advocating (as far as I know, don't correct me if I'm wrong ) the notion
that the world would be a better place without someone because and only
because of the color of her skin. UU's and unschoolers and Trekies
aren't a threat to anyone's safety, ( except maybe the Borg ).

It's just plain hard to feel ok about someone who thinks like this.
But it's true, he won't be changed by righteous indignation.

Deb L
